plugin.name: SqueezeDSP
plugin.title: SqueezeDSP
plugin.desc: DSP for Lyrion Music Server - provides EQ and DSP.
plugin.changes: Fixed issue where there is only a PEQ filter, then the checks for FIR filter cause early termination
plugin.creator: Jonathan Fox

plugin.name: InguzEQ
plugin.title: SqueezeboxEQ
plugin.desc: DSP and EQ for Squeezebox server based off InguzDSP
plugin.creator: Jonathan Fox
plugin.changes: Split templates for config into separate file, and plugin now detects when the template has changed and re-writes config based off this. Amended template for flac and added in wmal setting for 24 bit.
